Justification: THIS ITEM IS REQUESTED FOR USE BY THE FAIRBANKS POLICE DEPARTMENT.  THE INTENDED USE IS DIRECTLY RELATED AND TO FURTHER THE LAW ENFORCEMENT, PUBLIC SAFETY MISSION OF THE POLICE DEPARTMENT.  THE FAIRBANKS POLICE DEPARTMENT CURRENTLY DOES NOT POSSES A SIMILAR VEHICLE AND HAS A TRAINED TACTICAL TEAM WITH ASSIGNED PERSONNEL, CONSISTING OF SWORN LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICERS

THIS ITEM IS USED ON THE 7 EACH OH-58 HELICOPTERS THAT WE CURRENTLY OPERATE.  THESE HELICOPTERS ARE USED IN VARIOUS ASPECTS OF LAW ENFORCEMENT IN THE STATE OF ALABAMA SUCH AS SEARCHES FOR MISSING CHILDREN, ALZHEIMER'S PATIENTS, AND ESCAPEE'S.

THE ALABAMA LAW ENFORCEMENT AGENCY CURRENTLY OPERATES A FLEET OF OH58 HELICOPTERS.  THE UNIT SUPPORTS STATE, LOCAL AND FEDERAL AGENCIES IN A LAW ENFORCEMENT CAPACITY.  THESE AIRCRAFT ARE USED FOR SEARCHES FOR MISSING CHILDREN, MISSING ALZHEIMER'S PATIENTS, AND FLEEING FUGITIVES.  WE ALSO SUPPORT IN DRUG ERADICATION PROGRAMS AND HOMELAND SECURITY MISSIONS.  THESE PARTS WILL CONTINUE TO SUSTAIN UNIT OPERATIONS FOR THE FUTURE.

WILL BE USED BY AZDPS TROOPERS AT SHOOTING RANGE TO ALLOW TROOPERS TO WASH HANDS AFTER SHOOTING AS TO REMOVE ANY LEAD CONTAMINATION FROM SHOOTING OR PICKING UP SPENT CARTRIDGES.  SHOOTING FACILITY DOES NOT HAVE A SINK.  THIS IS AN OFFICER SAFETY HAZARDOUS CONDITION SITUATION.

OUR AGENCY WILL USE THEM TO PROTECT EVIDENCE ON DECEASED INDIVIDUALS.  IN THE INVESTIGATION OF A HOMICIDE IT IS OFTEN NECESSARY TO PROTECT A BODY, THE  DECEDENT FROM FURTHER CONTAMINATION.  THE MATTRESS PADS WILL BE USED AS A PROTECTIVE COVER FOR THEM.  THEY ARE SEALED AND CLEAN AND THEREFORE WILL NOT CONTAMINATE THE EVIDENCE ON THE BODY.
THERE ARE MANY FORMS AND REPORTS THAT ARE COMPLETED IN LAW ENFORCEMENT AND THAT MUST BE SHREDDED FOR DESTRUCTION.  WE WOULD USE THIS PAPER SHREDDER TO SHRED CONFIDENTIAL DOCUMENTS.

THESE WOULD BE WORN IN THE LABORATORY TO PROTECT THE WEARER WHILE THEY WERE PROCESSING EVIDENCE USING HAZARDOUS CHEMICALS.  THEY WOULD ALSO ALLOW FUR HIGH LEVEL PROTECTIONS FROM BODY FLUIDS IN THE FIELD, WHILE LOOKING FOR EVIDENCE.

IN LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICERS HAVE TO DEAL WITH INDIVIDUALS THAT HAVE INFECTIONS THAT ARE TRANSMITTABLE BY AIR.  THEY ARE ALSO EXPOSED TO HAZARDOUS POWDERS AND MISTS.  THESE WILL PROTECT THEM FROM THE EXPOSURES.  THEY WILL BE USED BY PATROL OFFICERS, DETECTIVES AND IN THE LABS.

THE QUANTITY BEING REQUESTED WILL ENSURE THE REQUIRED SYSTEMS CAN REMAIN OPERATIONAL.

THE COVINA POLICE DEPARTMENT WILL USE THESE CAMOOUFLAGE SCREENS TO PROVIDE PORTABLE SHADE DURING TRAINING AND OPERATIONS WHICH PLACE PERSONNEL OUTSIDE. THESE SCREENS WILL ASSIST PERSONNEL IN REMAINING OPERATIONAL DESPITE THE HEAT PARTICULAR DURING LENGTHY EVENTS SUCH AS TERROR MOTIVATED INCIDENTS.

PROVIDE OFFICERS EYE PROTECTIVE EQUIPMENT FOR USE DURING FIRING RANGE TRAINING  AND OR FOR BIKE PATROL OFFICERS TO USE WHEN RIDING THEIR PATROL BIKES.  THE EYEWEAR WILL, OBVIOUSLY, KEEP FOREIGN OBJECTS FROM STRIKING AN OFFICERS EYE AND THUS REDUCE CHANCE OF INJURY.

THE MACK IS VERY SIMILAR IN DESIGN TO THE REDMAN EQUIPMENT MANY AGENCIES USE.  THE EQUIPMENT WOULD BE USED BY AGENCY INSTRUCTORS TO ENHANCE THE REALISM OF ENCOUNTERS WITH COMBATIVE PEOPLE.  THE HAND TO HAND COMBAT TRAINING INCREASES AN OFFICERS CONFIDENCE IN HIS OR HER ABILITIES TO COPE WITH ADDITIONAL STRESSES AND THUS INCREASES SURVIVABILITY IN FORCE ENCOUNTERS.  EQUIPMENT TO BE MAINTAINED AT AGENCY IN SECURE ENVIRONMENT.

TO PROVIDE HEAT AT AGENCY RANGE FACILITY DURING FALL AND WINTER TRAINING ACTIVITIES.  ADDITIONALLY, ITEM CAN BE USED IN HEAT POOR AREAS OF AGENCY STRUCTURE TO KEEP OFFICERS WARM WHILE CLEANING EQUIPMENT OR VEHICLES.  TO BE KEPT IN LOCKED JANITORIAL SUPPLY CLOSET WHEN NOT IN USE.

PROVIDE DUST MASKS FOR OFFICERS TO AID IN PREVENTION OF INFECTION OR INHALATION OF DUSTS, MOLDS, POLLENS, OR OTHER HAZARDOUS DUSTS WHEN ENTERING CERTAIN ENVIRONMENTS WHEREIN THIS IS AN AVOIDABLE RISK. PROVIDE FIELD EQUIPMENT FOR DETECTIVES AND SUPERVISORS THAT IS MOISTURE AND DIRT RESISTANT THAT CAN BE EASILY CLEANED AFTER USE  AT A SCENE, ESPECIALLY ONE THAT INVOLVES BIOHAZARD MATERIALS. PROVIDE RAIL MOUNT FOR 1033 RIFLES IN AGENCY INVENTORY.  THE RIFLES HAVE THE STANDARD HAND GUARD WHICH MAKES MOUNTING A LIGHT OR RED DOT SIGHT IMPRACTICAL. PROVIDE TOOLS FOR BASIC MAINTENANCE OR CONSTRUCTION AT BOTH AGENCY MAIN BUILDING AND AGENCY FIRING RANGE TO SPEED UP OR FACILITATE ASSEMBLY AND DISASSEMBLY OF MATERIALS AND EQUIPMENT.  WHEN NOT IN USE THE DRILLS WILL BE STORED IN EITHER A LOCKED CONNEX BOX OR A LOCKED QUARTERMASTER ROOM.

THIS AGENCY HAS TWO TRAILERS AND ACCESS TO OTHERS.  THE CAPACITY TO SECURE ITEMS TO THEM COMES UP ROUTINELY ESPECIALLY WHEN LARGE ITEMS OF RECOVERED PROPERTY ARE MOVED.  THE TIE DOWNS WOULD BE USED FOR THE PURPOSE OF PREVENTING LOAD SHIFT DURING TRANSPORT.

PROVIDE FACE SHIELDS FOR PASGT HELMETS ALREADY IN AGENCY INVENTORY.  THE FACE SHIELDS WILL BE MOUNTED ON THE HELMETS FOR PERMENANT USE.  THE SHIELDS WILL PROVIDE AN INCREASED MEASURE OF SAFETY FOR OFFICERS IN CROWD CONTROL SITUATIONS IF OBJECTS ARE BEING THROWN AT THEM.

THIS EQUIPMENT WILL BE USED BY THE HENDERSON POLICE DEPARTMENT FOR SHELTER FOR THE OFFICERS OF THE DEPARTMENT WHILE WORKING SPECIAL EVENTS. THIS EQUIPMENT WILL BE USED BY THE HENDERSON POLICE DEPARTMENT TO HELP REMOVE TREES AND DEBRIS FROM OUR FIRING RANGE FACILITY. THE AED UNITS WILL BE UTILIZED BY ALPENA COUNTY DEPUTIES.  DEPUTIES ARE A FIRST RESPONDER IN A CARDIAC EMERGENCY, OFTEN TIMES ARRIVING BEFORE EMERGENCY MEDICAL PERSONNEL. APPROXIMATELY 365,000 PEOPLE IN NORTH AMERICA FALL VICTIM TO SUDDEN CARDIAC ARREST EVERY YEAR. THE ONLY EFFECTIVE TREATMENT FOR SCA IS A SHOCK FROM AN AUTOMATED EXTERNAL DEFIBRILLATOR.  THESE AEDS WILL BE CARRIED IN OUR PATROL VEHICLES WHICH COULD POTENTIALLY SAVE THE LIFE OF ONE OF OUR CITIZENS IN ALPENA COUNTY.

THESE TASERS WOULD BE UTILIZED BY DEPUTIES WITH THE ALENA COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICER.  DEPUTIES WILL UTILIZE THESE TASERS DURING THEIR PATROL DUTIES, DRUG SEARCH WARRANTS, WARRANT SERVICE AND PRISONER TRANSPORTS.  WITH A TASER, DEPUTIES HAVE ANOTHER OPTION.  IT WILL HELP DEPUTIES STAY SAFE, TO ACCOMPLISH OUR MISSION, AND HAS MINIMAL IMPACT ON THE SUSPECT.

THIS ITEM WOULD BE USED BY DEPUTIES EMPLOYED AT THE ALPENA COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE.  ALPENA COUNTYS EASTERNMOST BORDER IS LAKE HURON WHICH IS THE SECOND LARGEST GREAT LAKE. OUR DEPARTMENT IS IN NEED OF SMALLER MORE PORTABLE ROBOTS. WE RECOGNIZE THE NEED FOR ROBOTS TO COMPLETE OUR JOB SAFELY. THESE ROBOTS WOULD BE USED TO ENSURE THE GENERAL PUBLICS SAFETY AND OFFICERS SAFETY IN A TACTICAL AND PATROL LEVEL FUNCTION.

OUR POLICE DEPT DOES NOT CURRENTLY HAVE THE CAPABILITY TO MOUNT A THERMAL IMAGING SYSTEM. WE RECOGNIZE THE IMPORTANCE OF THERMAL IMAGING TO KEEP POLICE OFFICERS AND THE PUBLIC SAFE. THIS DEVICE WOULD BE USED BY OUR POLICE OFFICERS AND SWAT OFFICERS.

THE ROBOT WILL FILL A CAPABILITIES GAP FOR THE ST PAUL POLICE BOMB SQUAD. THIS UNIT IS A STATE OF MINNESOTA RESPONSE TEAM AND RESPONDS TO EXPLOSIVE HAZARDS AND THREATS , ANYWHERE IN THE STATE.  THIS ROBOT'S ABILITY TO UTILIZE REMOTE PROCEDURES WILL ENHANCE THE BOMB SQUADS ABILITY TO SAFELY RESOLVE EXPLOSIVE HAZARDS IN MINNESOTA.

THESE DEVICES ARE A LESS LETHAL OPTION CAPABLE OF FIRING MARKING ROUNDS OR IRRITANT AT SUBJECTS TO GAIN COMPLIANCE.  THIS AGENCY CURRENTLY HAS SEVERAL THAT ARE MISSING PARTS. EAR PLUGS PROVIDE THE NECESSARY PROTECTION FOR OFFICERS DISCHARGING FIREARMS DURING TRAINING AND QUALIFICATION WITHIN THE FACILITY.

THIS STYLE OF NIGHT VISION IS SUPERIOR TO CURRENT UNITS UTILIZED BY THIS AGENCY.  THE GOGGLES OFFER AN INCREASED FIELD OF VIEW OFFERING A HIGHER MARGIN OF SAFETY FOR THE OPERATOR AND THE PUBLIC. THIS AGENCY IS IN THE PROCESS OF UPDATING ITS COMPUTER INFRASTRUCTURE AGENCY WIDE.  WE WILL USE THE REQUISITIONED SERVER TO MOVE AGENCY RECORDS, FROM A COLLECTION OF STAND ALONE COMPUTERS, TO A MORE SECURE, NETWORKED, UNIFORMLY MANAGED, AND PROTECTED ENVIRONMENT.  DOING SO WILL PROVIDE AN EASIER SOLUTION TO PROTECT, BACKUP, AND CONTROL ACCESS TO PROTECTED INFORMATION.  THIS WILL PROVIDE BETTER ACCOUNTABILITY, AND A MORE ECONOMICAL APPROACH TO RECORDS MANAGEMENT FOR THE AGENCY.

THIS AGENCY IS IN THE PROCESS OF UPDATING AND EXPANDING ITS COMPUTER INFRASTRUCTURE AGENCY WIDE.  WE WILL USE THE REQUISITIONED COMPUTER WORK STATIONS TO PROVIDE ACCESS A NETWORKED SERVER WITHIN A MANAGED AND CONTROLLED ENVIRONMENT. DOING SO WILL PROVIDE AN EASIER SOLUTION TO SECURE, BACKUP, AND CONTROL ACCESS TO PROTECTED INFORMATION.  THIS WILL PROVIDE BETTER ACCOUNTABILITY, AND A MORE ECONOMICAL APPROACH TO RECORDS MANAGEMENT FOR THE AGENCY.

THIS AGENCY IS IN THE PROCESS OF UPDATING ITS COMPUTER INFRASTRUCTURE AGENCY WIDE. THIS AGENCY WILL USE THE REQUESTED TRAILER MOUNTED GENERATOR TO PROVIDE POWER TO A PLANNED TRAINING FACILITY REMOTELY LOCATED AWAY FROM PUBLIC UTILITIES, ON THE AGENCYS CURRENTLY OPERATIONAL FIRING RANGE, WHICH IS LAW ENFORCEMENT USE ONLY. Item Name: INTERCOM AND PA SYSTEMS, EXCEPT AIRBOR
Justification: THESE ITEMS WOULD BE USED BY OUR POLICE OFFICERS DURING SURVEILLANCE OPERATIONS, AND DURING EVENTS TO LIMIT COMMUNICATIONS ON OUR PRIMARY RADIO FREQUENCIES.  THESE ITEMS WOULD PROMOTE OFFICER SAFETY BY ALLOWING UNINTERRUPTED COMMUNICATIONS BETWEEN OUR POLICE OFFICERS.

THIS ITEM WOULD BE USED BY OUR POLICE OFFICERS TO PROVIDE INFORMATION TO THE PUBLIC REGARDING SPECIAL EVENTS, AND EMERGENCY SITUATIONS.  THIS SIGN COULD BE VERY BENEFICIAL TO THE POLICE DEPARTMENT IN PROVIDING PUBLIC SAFETY MESSAGES TO THE PUBLIC.
THIS ITEM WOULD BE INSTALLED ON OUR HMMWV AND WOULD BE USED BY OUR POLICE OFFICERS DURING INCLEMENT WEATHER AND DURING OTHER RELATED EMERGENCIES.

THIS LIGHT BAR WOULD BE INSTALLED ON THE ROOF, FRONT AND REAR, OF OUR HMMWV TO PROVIDE ADDITIONAL LIGHTING DURING CRIME SCENES, EMERGENCY SCENES, AND DURING SEVERE INCLEMENT WEATHER EVENTS.  THIS LIGHT BAR WOULD PROVIDE ADDITIONAL LIGHTING THAT WOULD BE VERY BENEFICIAL FOR PUBLIC AND OFFICER SAFETY.

THIS ITEM WOULD BE USED BY OUR POLICE OFFICERS TO CONTROL THE CLIMATE INSIDE OF OUR HMMWV DURING EXTREME HEAT EMERGENCIES AND EXTENDED TRIPS IN THE VEHICLE.  THIS WOULD MAKE RIDING IN THE HMMWV MUCH MORE BEARABLE DURING SUMMER EVENTS THAT THE VEHICLE CAN BE USED FOR.

THIS ITEM WOULD BE USED BY OUR POLICE OFFICERS TO PATROL OUR OVER 300 ACRES OF PARKS.  IT WOULD ALSO BE USED BY OUR POLICE OFFICERS TO TRANSPORT EQUIPMENT TO SPECIAL EVENTS.  ON OUR PARK LANDS, GAS AND DIESEL ENGINES ARE PROHIBITED AND THIS ELECTRIC VEHICLE WOULD BE A USEFUL TOOL TO SAVE OUR OFFICERS FROM CARRYING THE ITEMS NEEDED FOR OUR TOWN'S SPECIAL EVENTS.
THIS ITEM WOULD BE USED BY OUR POLICE OFFICERS TO STORE ELECTRICAL COMPONENTS RELATED TO OUR POLICE VEHICLES.  THIS ITEM WOULD ALLOW USE TO BETTER ORGANIZE OUR EQUIPMENT.

THESE ITEMS WOULD BE USED TO BURY UNDERGROUND TO RUN ELECTRIC TO OUR FIREARMS RANGE SHELTER.  THESE ITEMS WOULD ALLOW US TO PROVIDE LIGHTING TO OUR RANGE SHELTER FOR OUR NIGHT QUALIFICATIONS.  THESE ITEMS WOULD GREATLY ENHANCE OFFICER SAFETY, ALLOWING US TO ILLUMINATE THE SHELTER SO OUR OFFICERS WERE NOT HAVING TO HANDLE FIREARMS IN THE DARK.
